title: ICYMI: anxiety vortex is a thing. 80% of our anxious pain derives from being anxious about being anxious. We feel we shouldnâ€™t be feeling fear or anxiety, so we come down on ourselves when we do.
summary: Instead of fearing the fear, we see it for what it is, and do it once, skipping the anxious-about-being-anxious spin cycle.
source: Get a step-by-step breakdown of Sarah Wilson's "#1 Anxiety Tip To Help You Right Now"
